translations: 蛋黄酱；<英>用蛋黄酱调制的食物

sentences.sentence: The bread, pastry and mayonnaise are homemade.
sentences.translation: 面包、糕点和蛋黄酱都是自家做的。

sentences.sentence: When you make coleslaw or potato salad, use light or non-fat mayonnaise.
sentences.translation: 当你做凉拌卷心菜或者土豆沙拉时，用清淡或者无脂的蛋黄酱。

sentences.sentence: "You're always saying No," they complain as I tell them they can't have yet more mayonnaise on their dinner.
sentences.translation: 当我告诉他们晚餐不能再吃蛋黄酱时，他们抱怨说：“你总是说不。”
